attributes.action: Withdraw military support for Ukraine, prohibit the use of UK-made missiles.
attributes.background: Immediately withdraw UK made missiles from use in Ukraine against Russia. Take urgent steps to de-escalate tensions between the UK and Russia.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Take action to prevent UK supplied missiles being fired into Russia 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702468

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525

Seek to start peace talks between Russia and Ukraine 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702643
